channel.title: I need help from a good coder
channel.description:
I myself know the basics. I can code commands, understand some java, etc. But, I am in need of help from a good coder.
I am tired of it, and I really need to put this to a stop. Duping.
The only duping method I am aware of is:
1. The player(s) trade eachother. 2. Both players accept the trade, then as it is accepted, they click soemwhere on the mini-map. 3. Both players keep/recieve the item(s).
Can anyone help me on how to remove this? I am tired of having to crack down on peoples accounts, etc.

item.title: I need help from a good coder
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

I myself know the basics. I can code commands, understand some java, etc. But, I am in need of help from a good coder.

I am tired of it, and I really need to put this to a stop. Duping.

The only duping method I am aware of is:

  1. The player(s) trade eachother.
  2. Both players accept the trade, then as it is accepted, they click soemwhere on the mini-map.
  3. Both players keep/recieve the item(s).

Can anyone help me on how to remove this? I am tired of having to crack down on peoples accounts, etc.
